import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import plotly.express as px
%matplotlib inline
source.675f630f:
fig = px.histogram(df, 
                   x='Pregnancies', 
                   marginal='box', 
                   color='is_diabetic',
                   nbins=18, 
                   title='Distribution of Pregnancies')
fig.update_layout(bargap=0.1)
fig.show()

source.b6a6e5d5:
## Conclusion
 - Women with pregnancies higher than 13 are diabetic
 - Women with higher BMI are more likely to be diabetic
 - Women with higher age are more diabetic
 - Most common insulin level among all individuals is 150-199 with 440 women out of which 39.09% are diabetic
 - Glucose has highest impact on whether a person is diabetic or not
source.d3479466: Highest glucose level is 100-101.9 and least is 44 with almost normal distribution and it also shows that diabetic people have more glucose
source.06251737: Distribution of Blood Pressure is normal as well with highest of 70-79
source.c37477c1: Here, we can say that diabetic people have higher BMI.
source.751e433d: Glucose has highest correlation with outcome meaning people with higher glucose levels likely to have diabetes
source.f190d144: The distribution is declining as the number of pregnancies increases. Highest number of pregnancy is 1 with 135 women and least is 16 with zero women. Less number of women are diabetic in each pregnancy range but all of them are diabetic in pregnancies greater than 13.
source.2d9f6a5f: Minimum glucose level is 44 and maximum is 199
source.646ba9ac: Most people have skinthickness in the range of 28-29.9
source.7eacc57b: Most common Insulin level in people is 150-199. However, we can't see any obvious pattern here
source.5731ce66: Number of diabetic patients increases with age
